root.name: Jett Rocket
root.description: Jett Rocket, developed and published by Shin'en Multimedia, is a platformer exclusively available for WiiWare. The game takes place on the planet Yoroppa, which has been attacked by an evil force which has been attacked by an evil force called the Power Plant Posse. The game lets the player explore the world in a variety of ways including parachuting, riding a jet pack, and snowboarding.
